DOC.brief_summary: A cohort study with Korean adults to investigate biomarkers in prediction of cardiometabolic and other diseases
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of Metabolic Risk in Korean Adults
DOC.detailed_description: This is a prospective cohort study with Korean adults to investigate biomarkers in prediction of cardiometabolic and other diseases
DOC.criteria: Healthy adults without chronic diseases Diabetic patients who are well controlled with oral antidiabetic agents Hypertensive patients who are well controlled with oral antihypertensive agents Dyslipidemic patients who are well controlled with oral lipidlowering agents Malignancy Chronic wasting disease Longterm steroid use
